availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Outhwaite Barter (Louisville, Kentucky, clerk, broker, and merchant)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, clerk, broker, and merchant. Native of England. Married to Lizzie Huyler Barter in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on June 3, 1851. Father of Emily Morehead Barter. Married to Fannie M. Prath Barter in Hamilton County, Ohio, on June 10, 1863. Clerk in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Produce broker in partnership with Pendleton T. Stewart in Stewart & Barter in Louisville in 1861. Commission broker in Louisville in 1862. Commission merchant from 1863 through 1865.
